name: The root of all evil (Omar waheed)
name_original: The root of all evil (Omar waheed)
description:
it's a simple clicker, just pick up an object and merge it with another, enjoy

This game was created during GGJ 2023 with the theme "Roots", the game was created fully within 6 hours, developed completely inside GDevelop game engine, using only assets from Keynny.com
